frontmatter.title: AMR-to-Logic
frontmatter.description: Semantic parsing part of the NeSA pipeline to convert natural language text into contextual logic

internal.content:
---
title: AMR-to-Logic
description: Semantic parsing part of the NeSA pipeline to convert natural language text into contextual logic
url: https://github.com/IBM/AMR-CSLogic
tag: "NLP"
tags: ["NLP","NeSA"]
weight: 4
---



## Description

The logic generated by this component is used by the next stages of the pipeline to learn the policy.  The development repository is [here](https://github.com/CognitiveHorizons/AMR-CSLogic) (limited access).

## Main Contributors

Vernon Austel, Jason Liang, Rosario Uceda-Sosa, Masaki Ono, Daiki Kimura
